body: Did a spider crawl out of Asuka's mouth in one panel?
Another great take on the aftermath of End of Eva.

Lol 7/10 is above average lol. 
1-awful.
2-bad.
3-below average.
4-slightly below average.
5. Average.
6. Slightly above average.
7. Above average.
8. Great.
9. Awesome.
10. Masterpiece.
This is the proper way to grade something score wise.

Re-Take really isn't super good, it's just that their really isn't anything to compare to it's scale. Also it was released like more than a decade ago I think, so the standards have definitely changed. Other than that Rei and Asuka are pretty unrealistic, at least in like the first part where Rei offs herself, and Asuka and Shinji hookup, in the final part where Asuka leaves for Germany is ok. Re-Take isn't shit, but it's not like a Mona Lisa, I would give it 7/10, which in my book is not failing or passing.

i loved this piece so freaking much! mebae, arigato!!! seriously the art style is splendid, and its not just fucking hentai. Its really fun once in a while to look at these works that have so much meaning and story in them
